definition: short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.chinese: 人民警察必须做到公正执法。

sentences.english: People's policemen shall take an active part in rescue and relief work as well as in social welfare services.
sentences.chinese: 人民警察应当积极参加抢险救灾和社会公益工作。

sentences.english: Whoever poses as a People’s policeman in order to practise fraud shall be given a heavier punishment according to the provisions of the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 冒充人民警察招摇撞骗的，依照前款的规定从重处罚。

sentences.english: The lost child was led back by a people's policeman.
sentences.chinese: 走失的孩子由一个人民警察领回来了。

sentences.english: Article 25 The people's police shall practise the system of police ranks according to law.
sentences.chinese: 第二十五条人民警察依法实行警衔制度。

sentences.english: Article 2 A system of police ranks shall be practised for the people's police.
sentences.chinese: 第二条人民警察实行警衔制度。

sentences.english: Whoever impersonates a people's policeman to go about and deceive people shall be given a heavier punishment in accordance with the provisions of the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 冒充人民警察招摇撞骗的，依照前款的规定从重处罚。

sentences.english: Justice is the target and value of police's law enforcement.
sentences.chinese: 公正执法是人民警察执法活动追求的目标和价值。

sentences.english: All these depend on high-quality people's police in prisons.
sentences.chinese: 这一切要靠高素质的监狱人民警察来完成。

sentences.english: Where are the Peoples Police when you need them?
sentences.chinese: 在你需要人民警察的时候他们在哪里？

sentences.english: Article 22 The people's police who are expelled from public service shall be deprived of their police ranks accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 第二十二条人民警察被开除公职的，其警衔相应取消。

definition: Serve the People!, CCP political slogan
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
